sense.gloss: to be caught, to be captured, to be taken prisoner, to be arrested, to be apprehended
to be seized with (fear, etc.), to be a slave to, to stick to, to adhere to, to be swayed by

sdata.j: ↑年↑↓とし↓をとるほど、ますます↑固定↑↓こてい↓↑観念↑↓かんねん↓に|とらわれる|ものです。
sdata.e: The older you grow, the more you tend to adhere to fixed ideas.

sdata.j: ↑被害↑↓ひがい↓↑妄想↑↓もうそう↓に↑囚↑↓|とら↓われる|な。
